title.en: Do I need a Cinque Terre Card?

description.en: Recommended for hiking trails and unlimited train travel. Not needed for just visiting villages by train

title.en: How many days should I spend?

description.en: Minimum 2-3 days to see all villages. 4-5 days ideal for hiking, relaxing, and experiencing local life

title.en: Which village is best to stay in?

description.en: Monterosso for beaches, Vernazza for charm, Manarola for views, Riomaggiore for nightlife, Corniglia for quiet

title.en: How do I travel between villages?

description.en: Train (fastest), ferry (scenic, seasonal), hiking trails (most rewarding), or combination of all three
Vary from easy (Via dell'Amore) to strenuous (high paths). Proper shoes essential. Some sections can be closed
Not recommended. Villages have steep stairs and narrow streets. Use luggage storage in La Spezia if needed
